name: COLORFUL WORLD
description:
Colorful World is a short game with only 3 levels where the story is about a Game Developer and Colore, the main character of his game who will teach him how to turn his fears and uncertainties into his greatest weapons.

------------------------------------------------------
☆ CONTROLS ☆
------------------------------------------------------

W, A, S, D  ->  Walk

MOUSE ->  Shoot / Pass Texts

HOLD SHIFT -> Run

ALT + ENTER / F4 -> Eneable / Disable Full Screen

ESC -> Close the game
